ocal chain in the east-side suburbs of Cleveland known as Captain Video. =

Wow, very cool! Jack Nieman was Bally's nat=
ional sales manager in the 1970s. Paul and I have mentioned him a few times=
 on recent episodes of the Astrocast podcast because Jack was often named i=
n people's letters to the Arcadian (and in the Arcadian itself).

I just di=
d a search of the Bob Fabris Collection. I have a short note to Bob from Ja=
ck from September 1978. I also have a letter that Bob wrote to Jack in 1980=
.

Adam
